name: Duality — PGH GGJ 2022
description:
For Global Game Jam: Pittsburgh 2022

Self imposed limitation: no art

You control the color of bars at the left and right edges of the screen. Thin bars will spawn from center screen towards them. The goal is to match the colors when they collide.

Controls Toggle Left ColorToggle Right ColorFJAD;←→Left ClickRight ClickL-Bumper or TriggerR-Bumper or Trigger

A consistent goal I have in my games is to include controls that will be comfortable for anybody. I ran out of time before I could test mobile controls.

An idea for a graphical update might include a dog and a cat as the player-controlled elements, and then having food scroll towards them and the player controls whether they eat or reject (e.g. biscuits and fish)

Made with Construct 3.
